donor_name: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
outputs.output_descr:
SRF South Sudan 18 Rural Livelihoods Projects


Note: SRF is a unique MDTF fund, which was an initative of Govt. of South Sudan in 2008 where UNDP was selected to implement recovery/development gaps through individual (18 PCA) projects with IPs. No standard UNDP project document developed or Output statement/baseline/indicator definition.
